text: Alkiviadis Papageorgopoulos (born 24 March 1937) is a Greek former sports shooter. He competed at the 1960, 1964 and the 1968 Summer Olympics. ==References== Category:1937 births Category:Living people Category:Greek male sport shooters Category:Olympic shooters of Greece Category:Shooters at the 1960 Summer Olympics Category:Shooters at the 1964 Summer Olympics Category:Shooters at the 1968 Summer Olympics Category:Panathinaikos shooters Category:Sportspeople from Athens
title: Alkiviadis Papageorgopoulos
